Title: Mukozuke
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Ayanna Floyd, Steve Lightfoot, Bryan Fuller
Actors: Hugh Dancy, Mads Mikkelsen, Caroline Dhavernas, Hettienne Park
Plot: Freddie Lounds finds Beverly's sectioned corpse; Will meets the copycat killer and orders him to kill Hannibal. Gideon overhears this and gives Alana the chance to save Will from becoming a murderer.
